TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Handling of IsDependent indicator in connection with overlay
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective of this test is to assess the ability to process the IsDependent indicator in connection with overlay.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Consumer receives a valid MIP4 payload and processes it into their system.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: Validated means to acquire information from the Producer using a MIP4 exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The consumer can process MIP4 payloads properly based on the state of the IsDependent indicator and change of state of the IsDependent indicator in connection with overlay.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: The Consumer successfully acquires content from the Producer and is able to apply it to their system without error.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain the valid MIP4 content from the producer containing payloads in which the object instance has a IsDependent indicator set to FALSE.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content is received from the Producer.
The Consumer successfully processes the content without error and displays the object in the consumer system.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain the valid MIP4 content from the producer containing payloads in which the object instance has a IsDependent indicator set to TRUE but the dependencies are not sent.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content is received from the Producer.

MIP 4.0 expected behaviour: the consumer successfully ignores the content without error and the object is NOT displayed by the consumer system.
MIP 4.1 expected behaviour: the consumer does NOT display the object, because the dependency is missing.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain an update of a valid MIP4 content from the producer containing payloads in which all objects are associated to an overlay.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content is received from the Producer.

MIP 4.0 expected behaviour: the consumer successfully processes the content without error and the object with IsDependent=FALSE is displayed and the object with IsDependent=TRUE is not displayed on the consumer system.
MIP 4.1 expected behaviour: the consumer successfully processes the content and all objects are displayed on the consumer system.
